name: Shattered Time, Open Source CRPG
blurb: The Medieval past, Steampunk present, and Cyberpunk future are torn apart by a Rift in time.

rewards.reward: Gain access to the Shattered Time pre-release forums for up to date info on the state of the game.
Gain access to the forums with a LEVEL 1 BACKER BADGE from the Medieval timeline.
Gain access to the forums with a LEVEL 1 BACKER BADGE from the Steampunk timeline.
Gain access to the forums with a LEVEL 1 BACKER BADGE from the Cyberpunk timeline.

Gain access to the forums with a LEVEL 2 BACKER BADGE of your choice from either the Medieval, Steampunk or Cyberpunk timelines.\r\n============================\r\nAs well as a PDF of  "A TIME TO CHOOSE" the Choose Your Own Adventure style short story to be released exclusively to Backers upon release of the game.

DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE SHATTERED TIME SOUNDTRACK
============================
PDF copy of "A TIME TO CHOOSE" a Backer Exclusive choose your own adventure short story.
============================
Gain access to the Shattered Time Backer forums with your choice of "LEVEL 2" BACKER BADGE from the Medieval, Steampunk or Cyberpunk timelines.

PRE LAUNCH GAME ACCESS!
============================
All backers from this tier onward will gain access, via DRM FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, to the finalized game 6 months PRIOR to the 'official' release date.
============================
PDF version of "COMPENDIUM HISTORIA ALTERNATE" a complete record of the alternate history featured in Shattered time, as well as parallels and descriptions of the real history that inspired each timeline and aspect of the game.
============================
Includes rewards of the previous tiers.

Gain access to the SHATTERED TIME BETA.
Slated for release in the Summer of 2015.
============================
Includes previous tiers. "LEVEL 3" BACKER BADGE

Access the ALPHA STAGE 3.
============================
Gain early access to Character Creation and the first three chapters of the final game. Have a chance to have your input heard on the final stage of development and gameplay polishing.
============================
SIGNED COPY of the SHATTERED TIME SOUNDTRACK.
============================
Includes previous tiers. "LEVEL 4" BACKER BADGE

Access the ALPHA STAGE 2. 
============================
Gain early access to Character Creation and introduction chapters of the game. Have a chance to have your input heard on the primary stage of development and gameplay.
============================
SIGNED PHYSICAL COPY of the SHATTERED TIME SOUNDTRACK
============================
SIGNED COPY of the Backer only PAPERBACK EDITION of "A TIME TO CHOOSE," a choose your own adventure short penned by the lead writer.
============================
Includes previous tiers. "LEVEL 4" BACKER BADGE

Access the ALPHA STAGE 1.
============================
Gain early access to Character Creation and  early gameplay tests. Including limited access to at least one area from the three primary timelines, and a number of the games primary mechanics. Have a chance to have your input heard on the development and gameplay direction of the game.
============================
SIGNED PHYSICAL COPY of the SHATTERED TIME SOUNDTRACK
============================
SIGNED COPY of the Backer only PAPERBACK EDITION of "A TIME TO CHOOSE."
============================
SIGNED SPECIAL EDITION COPY of a companion novel (to be penned in 2016) that will lead into the next project from Pixelation Games.
============================
Includes previous tiers. "LEVEL 4" BACKER BADGE

SIGNED, HARDBOUND COFFEE TABLE EDITION of "COMPENDIUM HISTORIA ALTERNATE"
============================
Featuring a detailed and rich history the the alternate timelines in which Shattered Time takes place. As well as direct comparisons to the real world history and places which inspired the game, featuring art from the game and a collection of 'books' from in the game.
============================
SIGNED PHYSICAL COPY of the SHATTERED TIME SOUNDTRACK.
============================
SIGNED COPY of the Backer only PAPERBACK EDITION  of "A TIME TO CHOOSE."
============================
SIGNED SPECIAL EDITION, HARDBOUND copy of a companion novel (to be penned in 2016) that will lead into the next project from Pixelation Games.
============================
Includes previous tiers. "LEVEL 5" BACKER BADGE

CREATIVE INPUT for a QUESTLINE NPC during a timeline of your choosing.
(Complete options to be made available to you by the developer.)
============================
Whether a character of your own design, or a prominent figure from history of your own choosing. Their alternate history to be decided by you in working with the developer.
All final decisions to be determined at Pixelation Games discretion.
============================

Full creative input on the game.

CORPORATE SPONSORSHIP\r\n============================\r\nHave your company name and logo prominently displayed on the website, on the forums, and as a splash screen whenever the game is launched. Forever remembered for directly supporting this Open Source initiative.
